content: I JUST installed this. It took me about 10 minutes of download, playing around with settings, etc. to get it right with my tablet, but it works great! I'm only using it for a second display for office type work....MS Office suite, email, etc. Pointers: Remember to turn on USB debugging on your tablet. The Display settings are accessed from the TwoMon app on your desktop, not through the normal right-click on the desktop menu. content: ...and so we go up to 5 stars!! Ok guys here's the kicker you *MUST* download and install the google USB driver for your android device, by default the device doesn't install a driver in windows and has a warning in device manager. Even if your device is working perfectly fine in windows that doesn't mean the device driver was installed.  Once that is taken care of it works just fine.  TwomonUSB will still show "no device connected" but it works just fine when you bring up the app on your tablet!
